page.title: 18SURVEY ON SHOPPING
page.content: IN OUR DESIGNATED AREA THERE IS A SHOPPING CENTRE. THE SHOPKEEPER (A CHEMIST) HAS BEEN IN BUSINESS IN THE CENTRE FOR 14 MONTHS. HE HAS COME FROM BLACKPOOL AFTER READING AN ADVERT IN A MEDICAL JOURNAL. HE BELIEVES THAT THE AREA IS A GOOD ONE TO SET UP BUSINESS. ALSO PROVIDED IN THE SHOPPING CENTRE IS A SUPERMARKET, A BAKERS, A BUTCHERS, A GROCERS etc. THE BUILDINGS IN THE CENTRE ARE GOOD AND SPACIOUS ALTHOUGH LEAKING ROOFS HAVE CAUSED COMPLAINTS. ON THE WHOLE WE FOUND THAT THIS IS A GOOD AREA FOR A SHOP.
